::Triggerhappy/Surgital/Cutthroat::

        Triggerhappy did multiple back=
flips and dodged the missiles.  He fired 2 shots from his compressed air ca=
nnon up at Astral.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Surg=
ital was hit by all the missiles, and fell to the ground.  He got up on his=
 feet, and he was enraged.

         "I must squash you all, you little fli=
es!" Surgital yelled.

        Both of his hands reverted into round, saw-b=
lades.  Then, he shot both of the blades at Astral.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~=
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
         Cutthroat tried to fly away from the missiles=
 and grenades.  The missiles hit his wings, and sent him falling to the gro=
und.  He got up, then shot a fireball from his mouth up at the Supernova/Sl=
asys/Scrap jet.
